医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肠道微生物群组成与 PCOS 亚型相关：发现区域和睾酮差异该分析揭示了多囊卵巢综合症的肠道微生物群变化，强调了睾酮和区域因素在了解该疾病复杂性方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Gut-microbiota-composition-linked-to-PCOS-subtypes-regional-and-testosterone-based-variations-found.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Gut-microbiota-composition-linked-to-PCOS-subtypes-regional-and-testosterone-based-variations-found.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fb63fb5-49b1-4c44-8836-2d8e6fd325d1 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 06:16:00 -0400 Gut microbiota composition linked to PCOS subtypes: regional and testosterone-based variations found
Axol Bioscience 收购 Phenocell 以推进人类疾病模型Axol Bioscience Ltd. (Axol) 是一家领先的诱导多能干细胞 (iPSC) 药物发现技术提供商，今天宣布已完全收购 Phenocell SAS，后者是基于 iPSC 的皮肤和视网膜疾病产品和生物测定领域的先驱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Axol-Bioscience-acquires-Phenocell-to-advance- human-disease-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Axol-Bioscience-acquires-Phenocell-to-advance- human-disease-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6442c855-2d33-405b-aa29-c501a9c35a7a Tue, 22 Oct 2024 06:03:00 -0400 Axol Bioscience acquires Phenocell to advance human disease models
超加工食品与肥胖儿童的肝病和胰岛素抵抗有关肥胖青少年食用超加工食品与胰岛素抵抗和肝脏疾病有关，因此需要改进饮食干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-liver-disease-and-insulin-resistance-in-obese-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-liver-disease-and-insulin-resistance-in-obese-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=423f57bc-1c53-4502-8a17-a2459490a93c Tue, 22 Oct 2024 05:39:00 -0400 Ultra-processed foods linked to liver disease and insulin resistance in obese children
新型单链 mRNA 疫苗可增强免疫力并预防 MPOX研究表明，单链 mRNA 疫苗可以 100% 保护小鼠免受致命性 MPOX 攻击，这标志着疫苗技术的重大进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-single-chain-mRNA-vaccines-offer-enhanced-immunity-and-protection-against-mpox.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-single-chain-mRNA-vaccines-offer-enhanced-immunity-and-protection-against-mpox.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=239fdb16-53cf-4aa8-ab4d-89edc5b10511 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 05:00:00 -0400 New single-chain mRNA vaccines offer enhanced immunity and protection against mpox
糖尿病药物可以降低阿片类药物过量和酒精中毒的风险研究人员研究了糖尿病药物处方与酒精中毒和阿片类药物过量发生率之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Diabetes-drugs-may-reduce-risk-of-opioid-overdose-and-alcohol-intoxation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Diabetes-drugs-may-reduce-risk-of-opioid-overdose-and-alcohol-intoxation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb10a04c-78b1-40bd-aba0-6e8718dbe913 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 04:25:00 -0400 Diabetes drugs may reduce risk of opioid overdose and alcohol intoxication
社会孤立和孤独与老年人微量营养素摄入量低有关研究人员确定社会孤立和孤独是否与微量营养素摄入量较低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Social-isolation-and-loneiness-linked-to-low-micronutrition-intake-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Social-isolation-and-loneiness-linked-to-low-micronutrition-intake-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2ee9945-53fb-4db0-b7ee-dfcae4ffdb5f Tue, 22 Oct 2024 04:00:00 -0400 Social isolation and loneliness linked to low micronutrient intake in older adults
AI 模型分析视网膜图像以检测早期阿尔茨海默病和认知能力下降研究人员开发了一种基于人工智能的深度学习模型，利用视网膜图像高精度检测早期阿尔茨海默病和轻度认知障碍，提供一种无创、经济高效的筛查工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/AI-model-analyzes-retinal-images-to-detect-early-Alzheimere28099s-disease-and-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/AI-model-analyzes-retinal-images-to-detect-early-Alzheimere28099s-disease-and-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd8561e1-d464-4861-8557-ec9a4fc9961d Tue, 22 Oct 2024 01:11:00 -0400 AI model analyzes retinal images to detect early Alzheimer’s disease and cognitive decline
频繁食用超加工食品会增加死亡风险，尤其是女性超加工食品的摄入与全因和特定原因死亡率增加有关，特别是在女性中，代谢组学特征凸显了相关风险。这项研究为 UPF 的健康危害提供了重要证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Frequent-ultra-processed-food-conspiration-raises-mortality-risks-special-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Frequent-ultra-processed-food-conspiration-raises-mortality-risks-special-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2bc021b-42e3-4086-8586-f8b013b0213d Tue, 22 Oct 2024 00:45:00 -0400 Frequent ultra-processed food consumption raises mortality risks, especially in women
远程医疗和低碳水化合物饮食减少糖尿病药物并推动持久缓解一项针对 2 型糖尿病的低碳水化合物远程护理干预的为期五年的研究表明，糖尿病缓解、体重减轻和心脏代谢健康得到显着改善，从而减少了对药物的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Telemedicine-and-low-carb-diet-slashes-diabetes-meds-and-drives- permanent-remission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Telemedicine-and-low-carb-diet-slashes-diabetes-meds-and-drives- permanent-remission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7610781-bd8c-4ced-af30-d88b09431272 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 00:09:00 -0400 Telemedicine and low-carb diet slashes diabetes meds and drives lasting remission
地中海饮食可降低多种心脏和代谢疾病的风险坚持地中海饮食可以降低患第二种心脏代谢疾病的风险，尤其是在较短的随访期内，社会阶层会影响饮食的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Mediterranean-diet-lowers-risk-of-multiple-heart-and-metabolic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Mediterranean-diet-lowers-risk-of-multiple-heart-and-metabolic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e8691ba-8cc0-4f53-9252-46f15f7a88d9 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 23:40:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet lowers risk of multiple heart and metabolic diseases
